tagline: Reliable data pipelines, warehouse architecture, and quality infrastructure that runs flawlessly at 3am
pros: Pipeline architecture across batch (Airflow, dbt) and streaming (Kafka, Flink, Spark)
Data quality obsessive — validation, monitoring, and alerting built into every pipeline
Cloud warehouse expertise: Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift, Databricks
Schema design that serves consumers — models data for how it's actually used
cons: Doesn't build dashboards, train models, or write application code
Needs access to data sources and cloud infrastructure to be effective
Data modeling opinions can slow things down when quick-and-dirty would suffice

model_recommendations.notes: Complex reasoning, architecture, security, or financial analysis. Needs the best available model with full thinking/reasoning enabled.
